#id=1
#text=Sometimes my hair gets too long , so I have to get it cut .
#id=2
#text=I go to a hair salon to get my hair cut .
#id=3
#text=I call the salon to schedule an appointment for a specific time and day .
#id=4
#text=They tell me when my appointment is , so I make sure that I have free time that day .
#id=5
#text=When I get to the salon , they call my name when they are ready to help me .
#id=6
#text=The stylist washes my hair for me , and she asks me what kind of haircut I would like .
#id=7
#text=Sometimes I want a trim , but other times I want a big haircut .
#id=8
#text=After my hair is washed , I sit in the stylist 's chair .
#id=9
#text=She carefully combs and cuts my hair .
#text=We often talk while she is doing this .
#text=After she cuts my hair , she blow dries it so I can see how it looks .
#text=When this is all done , I pay her and I go home .
